amendment.description: Amendment transfers $300,000 within DOE's Science account with the intent of restoring the National Undergraduate Fellowship Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to transfer $300,000 within the Science account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Foster amendment (A030) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A030) offered by Mr. Foster.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Foster amendment (A030) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
